body:
When Avicus update to 2.0 with the introduction of Avicade, I saw that there was a new Owner: IvyCode. Then funkystudios stop connecting to AVN, cleaning his rank and post in his profile "Switch to IvyCode"...
I'm asking you funkustidios is IvyCode, he just change his name, or he just give up from AVN and IvyCode is one friend?
body_tagged:

title: Funky, where are you?

replies.body:
Ivycode is still funkystudios.
End of discussion -.-
